name: Ned Smith
coverLetter:
This year my small garden (12 plants) was decimated by the neighbor's cows. I think I will salvage about an once and I have pictures of the onslaught.

Anyway, I have grown for many years and I have always done my owm trim work. I am highly adaptable, hard working, and very reliable. Not much exerience in a commericial environment, but, will make up for this with the ability to learn and get along well with fellow workers.

I live in Ashland and prefer to work here locally. Able to work after I get my kids on the bus, Monday though Friday, after 8:00 am and I am available weekends after 2:00 pm. I plan on working Mt. Ashland when the snow comes in December, but, if this gig works out well you never know.
 

Thank you for your kind consideration,

Ned
contact: Please contact me at nedsmith1642@yahoo.com or text/phone (775)203-8984
